description: Defines generic pagination classes for handling paginated data responses, including PageMeta for metadata and Paginated<T> for wrapping a list of items with pagination info.

classes.name: PageMeta
classes.description: Stores pagination metadata such as current page, page size, total items, and total pages.

classes.name: Paginated
classes.description: A generic class that wraps a list of items along with pagination metadata.

methods.name: PageMeta.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor for creating a PageMeta instance from JSON data.

methods.name: Paginated.fromJson
methods.description: Static method to create a Paginated instance from JSON data and an item parser function.
